title: Stylish Five-Star Hai Phong City Break with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Luxe Spa
description:
Feel the pulse of Vietnam with an elegant stay at this Mercure urban haven, strategically located in the heart of Hai Phong. From French colonial-era establishments to neo-classical architecture, this five-star hotel acts serves the perfect base to discover the city's timeless charms.

Soak up the captivating city views while you take a dip in the sparkling rooftop infinity pool, work up a sweat at the fitness centre, and pamper yourself with invigorating massages at Bloom Spa, perched on the 28th floor. When hunger strikes, savour Vietnamese specialities and delicious steaks at Flame Grill & Bar.
offer_address: 12 Lach Tray Street Ngo Quyen District, Hai Phong, Hai Phong, Vietnam, 180000

title: Contemporary Pullman Hai Phong Stay with Rooftop Pool & Six Restaurants & Bars
description:
Discover Hai Phong’s vibrant pulse from the sleek comfort of Pullman’s urban oasis. Ideally located on Tran Phu Street, the hotel offers modern luxury with sweeping views of the Cam River. Enjoy access to a serene rooftop pool and state-of-the-art wellness facilities, including a relaxing spa and fitness centre.

Indulge in reimagined Cantonese classics at Red Flowers Pavilion, or savour premium meat cooked over charcoal and fresh seafood with panoramic views at Mad Cow Wine & Grill. Pullman places you at the heart of Hai Phong’s rich cultural and culinary scene - with access to Hanoi, Ha Long Bay and Cat Ba Island for unforgettable day trips.
offer_address: No.12 Old Tran Phu Street, Ngo Quyen District, Hai Phong 180000, Vietnam

title: French Colonial Hai Phong City Escape with Glittering Outdoor Pool
description: Experience warm Vietnamese hospitality a the serene Avani Hai Phong Harbour View, a picturesque slice of paradise situated in the heart of charming Hai Phong. Adorned with French colonial architecture, this stylish hotel has everything you need for a relaxing escape. Immerse yourself in a variety of cuisines at the many onsite restaurants, keep up your fitness routine at AvaniFit or explore beyond the hotel and uncover the nearby Ha Long Bay.
offer_address: 12 Tran Phu Street, Ngo Quyen District, Hai Phong City, Vietnam
